mapper.sql: dict_code, dict_sort, dict_label, dict_value, dict_type, dict_skin, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
select * from sys_dict_data
dict_type like concat('%',#{params.dictType},'%')
and dict_label like concat('%',#{params.dictLabel},'%')
and status=#{params.status}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict_data (dict_sort, dict_label, dict_value, dict_type, dict_skin, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictSkin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_dict_data
dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_label = #{dictLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}
